question: who played the twins in darling buds of may
api_result: In the television series "The Darling Buds of May," which originally aired from 1991 to 1993, the roles of the twins, Zinnia and Petunia Larkin, were played by Christina and Catherine Giles. They portrayed the younger daughters of the central characters, Pop and Ma Larkin, in this popular British comedy-drama.
